title: Hayek and Paltrow speak out about equal pay
text:
Published By: Reuters Videos - Today 
Actresses Salma Hayek and Gwyneth Paltrow talk about their hopes for equal pay for women at Variety magazine's Women in Power event. Rough C... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
